title: 3 Myths About Manifesting Your Dream Job and 3 Ways to Start Doing It Right
description: There’s a lot of misinformation around the concept of manifestation, so today we’re going to dispel some myths.We’ll talk about the importance of intention, why the best intentions are meaningless without action, and a framework you can use to start manifesting your ideal job today.Enjoy!
author: onpurposepodcast@jayshetty.me (Jay Shetty)
content:encoded: There’s a lot of misinformation around the concept of manifestation, so today we’re going to dispel some myths.We’ll talk about the importance of intention, why the best intentions are meaningless without action, and a framework you can use to start manifesting your ideal job today.Enjoy!
